## Documentation Location

Which documentation needs updating?

- [ ] README.md
- [ ] docs/getting-started/

- [ ] Other: ___________

## Issue Type

- [ ] Typo or grammatical error
- [ ] Outdated information
- [ ] Missing information
- [ ] Unclear explanation
- [ ] Broken links
- [ ] Missing examples
- [ ] Other

## Current Content

Describe or quote the current content that needs updating.

## Suggested Change

Describe what the content should say or include.

## Additional Context

Any other context about why this change is needed.

## Checklist

- [ ] I have verified the current documentation
- [ ] This isn't a duplicate of an existing issue
- [ ] I am willing to submit a PR for this change (optional)
